title: What do I do if LOL does this even if I re-install?
body: I use Windows 8 to run LOL, and I know there has been issues, where it hasn't even run for people in the past all I am wondering is why this is happening on my pc. Until a few hours ago it was working fine, so I have one question, how in the world do I fix this?

replies.body: The error in your issue is usually caused by a permissions issue in your settings that blocking the patcher from launching.  Go over our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to get this fixed up.  Hope that helps!
Tht helped a lot, thank you ^-^.
